EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day - Vienna - 2014.09.17.Invite 2 - Partner Dinner - Not yet re
EmailTemplate.subject: You’re invited! Tricentis Partner Dinner 2014 – Testing for the Future, Now
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-partner-day-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
You’re invited! Tricentis Partner Dinner 2014
Testing for the Future, Now
September 17, 2014 at 6:00 pm CET
Restaurant Palmenhaus Palmenhaus, Burggarten A-1010 Vienna
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-partner-day-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
Tricentis Partner Day
Let’s do it more informal. Let’s keep the conversation going.
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
A while ago, you received an invitation for our Tricentis Partner Day on September 17th, in Vienna.
As we want to use this platform as an experience and know-how exchange, we have decided to re-shape the agenda of our Tricentis Partner Day to a “come together” with dinner. Please join us and meet with other partners from our partner ecosystem and the Tricentis Expert Team.
I would like to use this great opportunity to meet you in Vienna and hope to see you there.
Please register <http://innovate.tricentis.com/event-partner-day-2014.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> to reserve a seat.
Sincerely,
Michael Eckhoff Senior Vice President Sales Tricentis
To learn more, visit http://www.tricentis.com <http://www.tricentis.com/?> or follow us on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/tricentis-technology-&-consulting-gmbh>, Twitter <https://twitter.com/tricentis> or Facebook <https://www.facebook.com/TRICENTIS>.
